report.title: Beautiful Geometric Patterns Everywhere
report.author: TheVoid
report.bodytext: LSD was always my favorite drug and I have not had connections for it for a long time. I read about 2C-I and decided to give it a try. It was described as similar to LSD and 2CB. I'm very experienced in hallucinogens. /n /n I purchased 100mg from a reliable seller. I eyeballed 5 piles of 20mg each. I took one pile and made it into 4 piles of 5mg. I put 20mg in a small shot of water and downed it. My friend put 5mg in his beer. /n /n /n /n /n I started to feel it in about a half hour. My head started feeling very pleasantly cloudy. Colors intensified. After 45 minutes, I could see the carpets and walls making shimmery waves. This breathing movement was very much like a moderate dose of LSD. It would usually take me at least 4 hits of LSD to get the visuals I was getting at this point, and this is only an hour into the trip. /n /n So exactly one hour into the trip, my friend who had drank 5mg decided to snort 5mgs. I snorted 5mg as well making my total 25mg and his total 10mg. We immediately felt a rush coming to our brains from the insufflation. The visuals are now getting very intense. I am seeing beautiful geometric patterns everywhere. They are similar to LSD visuals, especially with the melting movements. It usually takes me 6 hits of LSD to achieve these kinds of visuals. /n /n I played Viewtiful Joe, an extremely visually trippy video game, and we watched Fear and Loathing in Las Vegas, which was the perfect choice. I really enjoyed 2C-I.
